lines.text: [as the cavalry detail approaches the cantina, several Mexican prostitutes meet them on the porch excitedly trying in Spanish to tell them of the trouble the Confederates have caused - one of them approaches Major Wolcott directly]
Sir, they're women... more or less. I don't think they know.
Now, we'll catch 'em if we can, but there'll be no crossing that border.
One man would. One man would kill Bentley if he had to go to hell to do it.
